TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlDocument extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 控件承载的 HTML 文档的顶级编程访问。

span.span: Provides top-level programmatic access to an HTML document hosted by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供 Internet Explorer 文档对象，也称为 HTML 文档对象模型 (DOM) 的托管的包装。 provides a managed wrapper around Internet Explorer's document object, also known as the HTML Document Object Model (DOM). 获取的实例通过属性的控件。You obtain an instance of through the property of the control. 在 HTML 文档内部的 HTML 标记可以嵌套在另一个。HTML tags inside of an HTML document can be nested inside one another. 因此表示其子级是实例的文档树的类。 thus represents a document tree, whose children are instances of the class. 下面的代码示例显示了一个简单的 HTML 文件。The following code example shows a simple HTML file. ```
Simple HTML Form
Enter Your Name:
``` 在此示例中，表示整个文档内的`HTML`标记。In this example, represents the entire document inside the `HTML` tags. `BODY`， `DIV`，`FORM`并`SPAN`标记由个人对象。The `BODY`, `DIV`, `FORM` and `SPAN` tags are represented by individual objects. 有几种方法可以访问此树中的元素。There are several ways you can access the elements in this tree. 使用属性来访问`BODY`标记和所有子项。Use the property to access the `BODY` tag and all of its children. 属性可让您上具有用户输入的焦点的 HTML 页面元素。The property gives you the for the element on an HTML page that has user input focus. HTML 页中的所有元素可以都有一个名称;集合提供对每个访问使用其名称作为索引。All elements within an HTML page can have a name; the collection provides access to each using its name as an index. 将返回的所有对象使用给定的 HTML 标记名称，如`DIV`或`TABLE`。 will return an of all objects with a given HTML tag name, such as `DIV` or `TABLE`. 将返回单个对应于你提供的唯一 ID。 will return the single corresponding to the unique ID that you supply. 将返回可提供的鼠标指针坐标在屏幕上找到。 will return the that can be found on the screen at the supplied mouse pointer coordinates. 此外可以使用和集合进行循环访问元素表示用户分别输入窗体和图形。You can also use the and collection to iterate through elements that represent user input forms and graphics, respectively. 基于由 Internet Explorer 的 DHTML DOM 实现的非托管接口： `IHTMLDocument`， `IHTMLDocument2`， `IHTMLDocument3`，和`IHTMLDocument4`。 is based on the unmanaged interfaces implemented by Internet Explorer's DHTML DOM: `IHTMLDocument`, `IHTMLDocument2`, `IHTMLDocument3`, and `IHTMLDocument4`. 仅最常用的属性和方法在这些非托管接口上的公开的。Only the most frequently used properties and methods on these unmanaged interfaces are exposed by . 您可以访问所有其他属性和方法直接使用属性，您可以强制转换为所需的非托管的接口指针。You can access all other properties and methods directly using the property, which you can cast to the desired unmanaged interface pointer. 一个 HTML 文档可能包含不同的窗口的帧内的控件。An HTML document may contain frames, which are different windows inside of the control. 每个帧将显示其自身 HTML 页。Each frame displays its own HTML page. 集合是可通过属性。The collection is available through the property. 此外可以使用属性来调整大小所显示的页面，滚动文档，或显示警报，并向用户提示。You may also use the property to resize the displayed page, scroll the document, or display alerts and prompts to the user. 公开可能希望处理托管 HTML 页面时的最常见事件。 exposes the most common events you would expect to handle when hosting HTML pages. 对于不直接通过该接口公开的事件，可以添加的事件使用的处理程序。For events not exposed directly by the interface, you can add a handler for the event using . HTML 文件可能包含`SCRIPT`封装在一个活动脚本语言，如 JScript 或 VBScript 编写的代码的标记。HTML files may contain `SCRIPT` tags that encapsulate code written in one of the Active Scripting languages, such as JScript or VBScript. 方法用于执行属性和方法中定义`SCRIPT`标记。The method provides for execution of properties and methods defined in a `SCRIPT` tag. > [!NOTE] > 尽管大多数属性、 方法和事件上具有保留相同的名称，因为它们对非托管的 DOM 与某些已更改为与一致[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。While most of the properties, methods, and events on have kept the same names as they have on the unmanaged DOM, some have been changed for consistency with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Northwind 数据库中的数据来创建`HTML TABLE`动态使用。The following code example uses data from the Northwind database to create an `HTML TABLE` dynamically using . 方法还使用，首先要添加的单元格 (`TD`元素) 到行 (`TR`元素)，然后将行添加到表中，最后，将表追加到当前文档的末尾。The method is also used, first to add cells (`TD` elements) to rows (`TR` elements), then to add rows to the table, and finally to append the table to the end of the current document. 代码示例要求您的应用程序具有名为控件`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. 加载文档之后，应调用代码。The code should be called after a document has been loaded. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该文档具有焦点，但文档的元素有没有获得焦点时返回元素相对应的``标记。When the document has focus, but no element of the document has been given focus, returns the element corresponding to the `` tag. 如果文档不具有焦点时，返回`null`。If the document does not have focus, returns `null`. 如果具有输入焦点的当前元素是一个单元格 (`TD`) 在 HTML`TABLE`标记，将返回包含的元素`TABLE`元素。If the current element with input focus is a cell (`TD`) in an HTML `TABLE` tag, will return the element that contains the `TABLE` element.

summary.span: 获取或设置超链接被用户单击后的 。

The for active links.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击它时，链接处于活动状态。A link is active when a user is clicking on it. 更改此属性来更改在导航之前链接的颜色。Change this property to change the color of the link prior to navigation. 中键入[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]支持`Alpha`值，而 HTML DOM 不工作。The type in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] supports an `Alpha` value, but the HTML DOM does not. 因此，`Alpha`不起作用时分配给此属性。Therefore, `Alpha` will have no effect when assigned to this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property All As HtmlElementCollection

summary.span: 获取 的实例，该实例存储文档的所有 对象。

span.span: Gets an instance of , which stores all objects for the document.
The of all elements in the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合提供随机访问任何元素在 HTML 文档中，而不考虑它在文档树中的位置。The collection provides random access to any element in the HTML document, regardless of its position in the document tree. 使用它来按名称、 ID、 访问 HTML 文档中的任何元素或索引。Use it to access any element in an HTML document by name, ID, or index. 也可以循环访问所有文档内的元素。You may also iterate over all of the elements within a document. 某些元素，如`HEAD`和`TITLE`，永远不会将具有与之关联的名称。Some elements, such as `HEAD` and `TITLE`, will never have names associated with them. 只有在 HTML 文件的作者分配它们，所有其他元素将具有名称。All other elements will have names only if the author of the HTML file assigned them. 您可以访问而无需按 ID 或索引的名称的元素。You can access elements without names by ID or index. 不能将元素添加到直接集合，因为对应的 HTML 中的所有元素都文件外部的`HTML`标记必须具有父元素。You cannot add elements directly to the collection, because all elements in an HTML file outside of the `HTML` tag must have a parent element. 使用方法或属性上的将新元素添加到树。Use the method or the property on to add new elements to the tree. ## Examples 下面的代码示例循环访问的所有文档和集元素`Enabled=True`，启用所有已加载文档时阻止用户输入默认情况下禁用的元素。The following code example iterates through all of the elements in a document and sets `Enabled=True`, enabling any elements that may have been disabled by default to prevent user input while the document was loading. 该代码示例需要您的应用程序包含名为控件`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到文档或其中一个对象。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 应调用此方法的最早是在事件的控件。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 此方法，可将处理程序附加到不通过公开的非托管 DOM 事件。This method allows you to attach handlers to unmanaged DOM events not exposed by . 有关可用的非托管 DOM 事件的详细信息，请参阅[在托管 HTML 文档对象模型访问未公开成员](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md)和 IHTMLDocument 接口： [IHTMLDocument](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882)， [IHTMLDocument2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884)， [IHTMLDocument3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886)， [IHTMLDocument4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887)， [IHTMLDocument5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888)。For more information about available unmanaged DOM events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model.md) and the IHTMLDocument interfaces: [IHTMLDocument](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882), [IHTMLDocument2](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884), [IHTMLDocument3](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886), [IHTMLDocument4](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887), [IHTMLDocument5](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888).

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档拆分为两个主要部分：An HTML document is split into two major sections: - `HEAD`其中包含文档的标题，任何文档元数据，并`SCRIPT`元素。`HEAD`, which contains the document's title, any document meta-data, and `SCRIPT` elements. - `BODY`它包含的元素中所涉及的所有屏幕上文档的外观。`BODY`, which contains all of the elements involved in the on-screen appearance of the document. 没有等效项`Head`属性上的。There is no equivalent `Head` property on . 若要获取`HEAD`元素中使用。To obtain the `HEAD` element, use . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新`DIV`元素并将其追加到的文档使用下方法。The following code example creates a new `DIV` element and appends it to the bottom of the document using the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果右键单击文档或元素在文档中，将鼠标它将显示默认上下文菜单中特定元素。By default, if you right-click your mouse on a document or an element in a document, it will display a default context menu particular to the element. 使用此事件可取消显示的上下文菜单并显示你自己的一个。Use this event to cancel the display of the context menu and display one of your own. ## Examples 下面的代码示例捕获事件并使用它来显示。The following code example captures the event and uses it to display a . summary.span: 获取或设置与此文档关联的 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP cookies associated with this document.

value.span: 一个包含 Cookie 列表的 ，其中的各个 Cookie 之间由分号隔开。

span.span: A containing a list of cookies, with each cookie separated by a semicolon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的公开为 Web 页设置的所有 cookie。The property of exposes all cookies set for a Web page. 一个*cookie*是与给定的 Web 页关联的任意名称/值对。A *cookie* is an arbitrary name/value pair associated with a given Web page. Web 开发人员使用 cookie 跟踪用户访问，或返回到 Web 站点。Web developers use cookies to track when users visit or return to a Web site. Cookie 是多个部分组成，称为 cookie crumb，用于确定以下：A cookie is composed of multiple parts, called cookie crumbs, that determine the following: - 文档设置为其应用该 cookie;其域和路径。The document set to which the cookie applies; its domain and path. - 名称和 cookie 的值。The name and value of the cookie. - Cookie 的到期日期。The expiration date of the cookie. - 是否将 cookie 只能发送使用安全连接。Whether the cookie can only be sent using a secure connection. 属性可能包含多个 cookie。The property may contain multiple cookies. 您只能使用属性一次设置一个 cookie。You can only use the property to set one cookie at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `elementTag` 可能是任何受支持的 HTML 标记在 Internet Explorer 中的其中一个除外`FRAME`或`IFRAME`。`elementTag` may be one of any of the supported HTML tags in Internet Explorer, except for `FRAME` or `IFRAME`. 返回未附加到当前文档树的元素。 returns an element unattached to the current document tree. 若要将元素添加到文档中，使用或方法。To add the element to the document, use either the or methods. 当你使用时，此方法不会影响现有文档的源代码的状态控件的**查看源**上下文菜单命令或并属性的控件。This method will not affect the state of an existing document's source code when you use the control's **View Source** context menu command or the and properties of the control. 当创建新元素，你将无法再设置一些特定属性，如`Name`。When you create new elements with , you will not be able to set certain properties, such as `Name`. 在需要设置 Name 属性的情况下，请将其分配到的 HTML 为文档中的另一个对象的属性。In cases where you need to set the Name attribute, assign them as HTML to the property of another object in the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Northwind 数据库创建一个 HTML 中数据的表使用。The following code example uses data from the Northwind database to create an HTML table using . 方法还使用，首先要添加的单元格 (`TD`元素) 到行 (`TR`元素)，然后将行添加到表中，最后，将表追加到当前文档的末尾。The method is also used, first to add cells (`TD` elements) to rows (`TR` elements), then to add rows to the table, and finally to append the table to the end of the current document. 代码示例要求您的应用程序具有控件调用`WebBrowser1`。The code example requires that your application has a control called `WebBrowser1`. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Domain : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，描述用于安全目的的此文档的域。

span.span: Gets or sets the string describing the domain of this document for security purposes.
A valid domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，在不同的帧中的两个网页不能访问彼此的内容使用脚本;甚至 www.microsoft.com 和 msdn.microsoft.com，在此情况下，被视为不同的域。By default, two Web pages in different frames are prevented from accessing each other's content using script; even www.microsoft.com and msdn.microsoft.com are, in this instance, considered different domains. 若要启用跨框架脚本的相同的顶级域中的页面，可以将新值赋给属性。To enable cross-frame scripting for pages from the same top-level domain, you can assign a new value to the property. 在早期的 URL 示例中，设置microsoft.com 将允许这两个页面进行相互通信。In the pervious URL example, setting to microsoft.com would allow both pages to communicate with one another. 字符串分配给属性必须是有效的顶级域。Strings assigned to the property must be valid top-level domains. 在以前的 URL 示例中，可以设置microsoft.com，而不是属于.com，这将启用脚本页面的内容在 Internet 上任何页。In the previous URL example, you can set to microsoft.com, but not to .com, which would enable any page on the Internet to script a page's contents. 不能使用属性来启用跨框架脚本使用两个不同的协议访问的页。You cannot use the property to enable cross-frame scripting for pages accessed using two different protocols. 如果您的页面中的一个帧来自 Web 服务器 （http:// 协议），而另一个来自文件系统 (file://) 协议，它们将不能相互通信而不考虑值属性。If one frame in your page comes from a Web server (the http:// protocol) and another comes from the file system (the file://) protocol, they will not be able to communicate with one another regardless of the value of the property.

exception.span: Domain 属性的参数必须是遵循域名系统 (DNS) 约定的有效域名。

span.span: The argument for the Domain property must be a valid domain name using Domain Name System (DNS) conventions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象的基础类型而异。The underlying type of the object returned by will vary. 如果被调用的活动脚本函数返回标量数据，如字符串或整数，它将作为字符串返回。If the called Active Scripting function returns scalar data, such as a string or an integer, it will be returned as a string. 如果它返回基于脚本的对象，如使用 JScript 或 VBScript 的创建对象`new`运算符的类型将为`Object`。If it returns a script-based object, such as an object created using JScript or VBScript's `new` operator, it will be of type `Object`. (您可以通过调用进行此类对象上调用并使用。)如果它返回一个 HTML DOM 元素，如`DIV`或`TABLE`，它的类型将为`Object`; 如果已添加对 MSHTML 的项目引用。DLL，但是，它将转换为特定的非托管 DOM 类型。(You can make calls on such objects by calling and using .) If it returns an HTML DOM element, such as a `DIV` or a `TABLE`, it will be of type `Object`; if you have added a project reference to MSHTML.DLL, however, it will be cast to its specific unmanaged DOM type. 您可能会调用用户的计算机，包括 JScript 和 VBScript 上安装任何活动脚本语言编写的任何函数。You may call any function written in any Active Scripting language installed on the user's machine, including JScript and VBScript. Nothing 如果用户已显式关闭 Internet Explorer 中执行脚本或网页上的当前安全配置不允许，则此方法将执行操作。This method will do nothing if the user has explicitly turned off script execution in Internet Explorer, or if the current security configuration for the Web page does not allow it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在网页中执行脚本的内容。The following code example executes the contents of a script in a Web page. 代码示例，则需要调用在应用程序中`WebBrowser1`，并且已加载以下 Web 页面。The code example requires that you have a in your application called `WebBrowser1`, and that you have loaded the following Web page. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果程序代码调用的网页加载将暂停方法的控件。The loading of a Web page will halt if program code calls the method of the control. 导航失败引起的网络中断或网站故障不会导致发生。Navigation failures caused by network outages or malfunctioning Web sites will not cause to occur. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重置 Windows 窗体应用程序上的状态栏时`Stop`事件已发生。The following code example resets the status bar on a Windows Forms application when the `Stop` event has occurred. 代码示例，则需要名为控件`StatusBar1`在应用程序中。The code example requires that you have a control named `StatusBar1` in your application. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有调用的前面应通过调用带有，这将清除当前文档及其所有其变量。All calls to should be preceded by a call to , which will clear the current document and all of its variables. 对调用将在其原位置创建新的 HTML 文档。Your calls to will create a new HTML document in its place. 若要更改仅在文档的特定部分，获取相应并设置其属性。To change only a specific portion of the document, obtain the appropriate and set its property. 建议您编写整个有效 HTML 文档中使用方法，包括`HTML`和`BODY`标记。It is recommended that you write an entire valid HTML document using the method, including `HTML` and `BODY` tags. 但是，如果您编写只是 HTML 元素，文档对象模型 (DOM) 将为您提供这些元素。However, if you write just HTML elements, the Document Object Model (DOM) will supply these elements for you. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打开一个新并将其写入新的 HTML 文件。The following code example opens a new and writes in a new HTML file.
